original_title: Ring in 2025 in splendor at Pegasus Reef’s tropical ‘Crimson Eve’ gala
original_body_lines: Pegasus Reef will be concluding the festive season with “Crimson Eve”, a grand year-end celebration, on the 31st of December 2024.

Crimson Eve aims to provide a distinctively tropical take on customary celebrations and promises a memorable evening filled with vibrant entertainment, fine dining, and joyful companionship. A visual and sensory feast that transforms the evening into an island paradise, the event’s theme celebrates the rich crimson hues of celebration intertwined with tropical charm. The sophistication of the year-end celebrations will blend with the warmth of the tropics to create an atmosphere that will leave guests with priceless memories.
Pegasus Reef extends a warm invitation to everyone to attend Crimson Eve, a colorful event that will cap out 2024 on a high note.

A sumptuous dinner buffet including a variety of culinary treats and live performances by the dynamic band Freeze and DJ Beats, are planned for the evening. Crimson Eve, blending sophistication, heaps of fun, and a touch of the tropics, is the ideal setting to welcome 2025 with loved ones in grand style.
Earlier in November, Pegasus Reef kicked off their festivities with the traditional Christmas cake mixing ceremony, and the ceremonial Christmas tree lighting happened in early December.

Renuke Coswatte, General Manager of Pegasus Reef, shared his enthusiasm. “We at Pegasus Reef take great pleasure in giving our visitors memorable joyful experiences. This year, Crimson Eve perfectly captures the essence of tropical celebrations, providing a lively, family-friendly setting where customs and the allure of our stunning setting collide. We are excited to have everyone join us in celebrating an end of another year and to usher in an exciting new year together.”
